actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the Flood Control Project for the Town of Niobrara, Nebraska.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to relocate Nebraska Highway Numbered 12, with necessary connections to Nebraska Highway Numbered 14, through the relocated town of Niobrara, Nebraska.

titles.title: A bill to modify the Flood Control Project for the Town of Niobrara, Nebraska.
